name: 3-ingredient Pancakes
description: These fluffy pancakes are made with only three ingredients, making for a quick and easy breakfast that's perfect for busy mornings.
instructions: In a bowl, mash the banana with a fork.
Add eggs and cinnamon. Mix until combined.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add a spoonful of batter and cook for 3-4 minutes, then flip and cook for an additional 3-4 minutes.
Serve with maple syrup or honey.
